0.1.name: wordpress/offtopic-shortcode
0.1.description: Allows authors to use the [offtopic] shortcode. [offtopic tag="div" autop="false" prepend="Offtopic:"]Did you know that this is how you use the offtopic shortcode?[/offtopic] Designers can style shortcode output using the offtopic and offtopic-prepend CSS classes.
